title: Senior Project Design Laboratory I
description: Selection, development, and completion of project by individuals or team which is typical of problems graduates must solve in their fields of employment or applied research. Project may involve, but is not limited to, physical modeling and testing of integrated design projects, costs, planning scheduling and research and may involve students from several disciplines. Formulation of outline, literature review, and project schedule. 2 laboratories.
prerequisites: MATH 244, IME 314, ME 302 or consent of instructor
